name: Chapigol
description:
The classic bottle cap game comes to life with Chapigol, a thrilling game that challenges you to guide your bottle caps as if they were actual soccer players. The ball never leaves the field and there are no fouls in this entertaining game, so you only have to worry about scoring goals and it won’t be easy; you have to learn really well how to use the controls in order to dodge your opponents, which slide around the field with great ease.

The team, field, color of the bottle caps and game time are totally customizable as are the controls, which you can set to adjust to your needs. Keep in mind that you can’t control the goalie so make sure to defend your goal with the rest of the bottle caps.

In Chapigol, rebounds are won my pushing your opponent so the only things left of this classic game are the games using bottle caps and the thrill of the game.
